title: WATCH: Graeme Souness Tears Strips Off ‘Arrogant’ Pep Guardiola

WATCH: Graeme Souness Tears Strips Off ‘Arrogant’ Pep Guardiola Tue Feb 21 2017 22:57:00 GMT+0000 (GMT) Tue Feb 21 2017 22:57:00 GMT+0000 (GMT) TheSPORTbible football 
Manchester City may have been victorious in the Champions League against Monaco tonight - but Graeme Souness insists Pep Guardiola and his players should count themselves very lucky. 
The two teams met at the Etihad on Tuesday night for their Champions League last-16 first-leg match, with City claiming the spoils 5-3 after a rip roaring 90 minutes. 
A classic Radamel Falcao performance helped put Monaco 3-2 ahead on the night, and only a crazy final 20 minutes saw City somehow come away with a two-goal advantage. Eight-goal thriller! Relive a phenomenal night at the Etihad as #CityvMonaco served up a classic! :raised_hands: #UCL https://t.co/V1V1TGbipw - BT Sport Football (@btsportfootball) February 21, 2017
